description.name: daiarbitrum
description.tagline: Dai Token arbitrum Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto arbitrum-dai Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Dai Token arbitrum directly on your website
Unique arbitrum/dai receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your arbitrum/dai wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
